replies.body: Pls lern how to play against...

the champion is almost balanced, but pls remove the ap scale on the ult for veigars ap. let it only skale with target ap (u may raise that) , so veigar isen`t just like: uuh an assasin, one shot ult him... im sure this could lead to more divers usage of veigars ult and give more outpick potential, for veigar who would then scale even better against ap laners and against a veigar, who now also can be countert by all-in oriented assasin champions like talon or zed.
ty Rito,
sry if my spelling or language is not optimal, but i think u get the idea
